Kernel/sources/time/cmos_time.c

00001 #include <time/cmos_time.h>
00002 
00003 #define BINARY_MODE_BIT 0x04
00004 #define H_FORMAT_BIT 0x02
00005 
00006 int cmos_bcd_to_decimal(int bcd)
00007 {
00008         return ((bcd>>4)*10)+bcd%16;
00009 }
00010 
00011 
00012 inline void fill_cmos_tstruct(cmos_time_struct* tstruct) 
00013 {
00014         uint32 IntBuffer;
00015         uint8 h_fmt = 0;
00016         uint8 mode = 0;
00017         char TextBuffer[128];
00018 
00019         uint8 temp_seconds, temp_minutes, temp_hours, temp_day, temp_dayofweek, temp_month, temp_year, temp_century; 
00020 
00021         IntBuffer = CMOS_READ(0xb);
00022         
00023         if ((IntBuffer & BINARY_MODE_BIT) == BINARY_MODE_BIT) 
00024         { 
00025                 //Binary mode = true
00026                 mode = 1;
00027         } 
00028         else 
00029         {
00030                 //BCD (Binary coded decimal) mode
00031                 mode = 0;
00032         }
00033 
00034         if ((IntBuffer & H_FORMAT_BIT) == H_FORMAT_BIT) 
00035         {
00036                 h_fmt = 1;
00037         } 
00038         else 
00039         {
00040                 h_fmt = 0;
00041         }
00042 
00043         //Ok so now we know the format that the date and time are gohna be in.
00044         
00045         //Handle seconds
00046         temp_seconds = CMOS_READ(0);
00047 
00048         if (mode == 1)
00049         {
00050                 //Seconds are already in binary
00051                 tstruct->seconds = temp_seconds;
00052         } 
00053         else 
00054         {
00055                 tstruct->seconds = cmos_bcd_to_decimal(temp_seconds);
00056         }
00057 
00058         //Handle minutes
00059         temp_minutes = CMOS_READ(2);
00060         if (mode == 1) 
00061         {
00062                 //Mins are already in binary
00063                 tstruct->minutes = temp_minutes;
00064         }
00065         else 
00066         {
00067                 tstruct->minutes = cmos_bcd_to_decimal(temp_minutes);
00068         }
00069 
00070         //Handle hours
00071         //This is the only one affected by the h_fmt bit.
00072         //If its set to true we don't need to do anything
00073         //If its set to false we need to check the 0x80 bit if its false then its am if its true then its pm
00074         temp_hours = CMOS_READ(4);
00075         if (mode == 1) 
00076         {
00077                 if (h_fmt == 0) 
00078                 {
00079                         //Binary
00080                         if ((temp_hours & 0x80) == 0x80) 
00081                         {       
00082                                 //PM
00083                                 temp_hours = temp_hours ^ 0x80;
00084                                 temp_hours += 12;
00085                         }
00086                 }
00087                 
00088                 tstruct->hours = temp_hours;
00089         }
00090         else 
00091         {
00092                 //BCD
00093                 if (h_fmt == 0) 
00094                 {
00095                         int pm = 0;
00096 
00097                         if ((temp_hours & 0x80) == 0x80) 
00098                         {
00099                                 //Its PM
00100                                 pm = 1;
00101                                 temp_hours = temp_hours ^ 0x80;                 
00102                         }
00103 
00104                         temp_hours = cmos_bcd_to_decimal(temp_hours);
00105                         if (pm == 1) temp_hours += 12;
00106                 }
00107                 else
00108                 {
00109                         temp_hours = cmos_bcd_to_decimal(temp_hours);           
00110                 }
00111 
00112                 tstruct->hours = temp_hours;
00113         }
00114 
00115         //Handle day of the week
00116         temp_dayofweek = CMOS_READ(6);
00117 
00118         if (mode == 1) 
00119         {
00120                 //already in binary
00121                 tstruct->dayofweek = temp_dayofweek;
00122         } 
00123         else 
00124         {
00125                 tstruct->dayofweek = cmos_bcd_to_decimal(temp_dayofweek);
00126         }
00127 
00128         //Handle days
00129         temp_day = CMOS_READ(7);
00130         if (mode == 1)
00131         {
00132                 //already in binary
00133                 tstruct->day = temp_day;
00134         }
00135         else 
00136         {
00137                 tstruct->day = cmos_bcd_to_decimal(temp_day);
00138         }
00139 
00140         //Handle month
00141         temp_month = CMOS_READ(8);
00142         if (mode == 1) 
00143         {
00144                 //already in binary
00145                 tstruct->month = temp_month;
00146         }
00147         else 
00148         {
00149                 tstruct->month = cmos_bcd_to_decimal(temp_month);
00150         }
00151 
00152         //Handle year
00153         temp_year = CMOS_READ(9);
00154         if (mode == 1) 
00155         {
00156                 //already in binary
00157                 tstruct->year = temp_year;
00158         } 
00159         else 
00160         {
00161                 tstruct->year = cmos_bcd_to_decimal(temp_year);
00162         }
00163 
00164         //Handle century
00165         temp_century = CMOS_READ(0x32);
00166         if (mode == 1) 
00167         {
00168                 //already in binary
00169                 tstruct->century = temp_century;
00170         } 
00171         else 
00172         {
00173                 tstruct->century = cmos_bcd_to_decimal(temp_century);
00174         }
00175 
00176         //Handle seconds
00177         temp_seconds = CMOS_READ(0);
00178         if (mode == 1) 
00179         {
00180                 //Seconds are already in binary
00181                 tstruct->seconds = temp_seconds;
00182         } 
00183         else 
00184         {
00185                 tstruct->seconds = cmos_bcd_to_decimal(temp_seconds);
00186         }
00187 
00188         return;
00189 }
